At-a-Glance: Price from costs + margin + market, not vibes. Offer a clear ladder: retail, case, and gift pack.
Why it Matters: Sustainable pricing funds welfare and growth.
Objectives: Calculate unit cost (ingredients, packaging, labour slice).
Set retail and wholesale margins with floors.
What Good Looks Like: Spreadsheet with costs, RRP, trade, VAT.
Gift pack bundles with round-price RRPs.
Clear policy on discounts and promotions.
Step-by-Step: 2) Pick margin floors; test RRPs in market.
3) Add bundles; check box and shipping costs.
Seasonality & Climate: Q4 elasticity higher—gift packs can carry higher margins.
Poor flow years raise input costs—update RRPs early.
Diagnostics & Decision Tree: Pushback on price -> Emphasise provenance; offer smaller size.
Margin squeeze -> Re-spec packaging or case counts.
Slow mover -> Bundle or seasonal promo; avoid panic discounts.
Common Pitfalls: Not updating for packaging price hikes.
Tools & Techniques: Costing sheet template, barcode scanning for stock counts.
Promo calendar with objectives and caps.
Safety & Compliance: Display legal price/weight; VAT handled correctly.
Honest claims; no medicinal pricing hype.
Communications: Explain value: local forage, small batch, traceability.
Notes: Price list as a PDF and a spreadsheet—buyers love both.
